AccurateControls.Description: Tries to recreate the controls and the physics of Super Monkey Ball 2 as closely as possible.

AccurateCamera.Description: Changes the way the camera works to make it feel closer to how it felt in the classic games.

AccurateStageTilt.Description: Makes the visual stage tilt amount match the classic games. Does not affect the gameplay.

DisableCameraControlsWhileMoving.Description: Prevents you from rotating the camera while moving.
